description: Learn the art of non-verbal communication, or rather, non-verbal domination, using just your eyes and face. This tutorial teaches you how to stare someone down, convey to them what is on your mind, how you feel and what you need them to do without ever saying a word. Discover how to put your submissive/slave in their place using only a glance.
title: Visual Takedowns: How to Dom with Your Eyes
